entry.summary: RT Austin Cain (📜,📜) This morning I joined @developer_dao ; if you work for a company building dev tools, you should too. My rationale: - Polygon is a developer platform - Our partners enable developers - Our users are developers How best to understand the pain points of your users? Become one.

entry.title: RT nader (🧱, 🚀) | nader.arweave.dev | nader.lens 🧢: Web3 Social Hub 🌿🪩 If you're planning to be in Bogotá 🇨🇴 for @EFDevcon event...
entry.summary: RT nader (🧱, 🚀) | nader.arweave.dev | nader.lens 🧢 Web3 Social Hub 🌿🪩 If you're planning to be in Bogotá 🇨🇴 for @EFDevcon events and want this to happen, hop into the forum and drop a comment or a like! ❤️ Thank you @shanvasion @Livepeer @AaveAave @LensProtocol @provenauthority @WaverlyMaven + others for spearheading this. 🙏 shann.lens ▶️ ETHMexico🇲🇽: Coming to Bogotá 🇨🇴 and want to continue the @ethlatam convo on Web3 Social 🌿🪩❤️✨? A special squad (@WaverlyMaven @0xChristina @parisrouz @provenauthority and more) has put together a proposal for a Community Hub @EFDevcon and we'd love ur love!👇 https://forum.devcon.org/t/community-hub-proposal-web3-social/938

entry.title: RT Emily 🔜 DappCon | EthBerlin: Officially joined @developer_dao 🥰 I think I need PTO so I can read the bajillion of messages in the Discord �...
entry.summary: RT Emily 🔜 DappCon | EthBerlin Officially joined @developer_dao 🥰 I think I need PTO so I can read the bajillion of messages in the Discord 😂 These guys are ACTIVE and I. AM. HYPED. So many aspiring devrel folks too 🥹 I'm stoked that ppl realize how this role is critical to dev success (+web3 in general)
